Short Ride is an adrenaline-pumping game available as a Chrome Extension. Get ready to put your life on the line as you embark on a bike ride like no other. In this game, tranquility is far from guaranteed as you face 20 challenging levels filled with deadly dangers. Prepare yourself for sharp saws, lethal spikes, explosive bombs, and an array of other destructive devices that will leave you limbless if you're not careful. Each level presents a treacherous course where agility and a hint of recklessness are necessary to survive. Your objective is to navigate through the obstacles, avoid the pitfalls, and collect three stars in each level. If you're feeling creative, you can even design your own courses using the level editor feature. Don't miss out on the thrill, play "Short Ride" for free at https://classroom-6x.org/.

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x, Poki Unblocked" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://poki.ee/
